alert.note: Alert for Huerfano; Las Animas; Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 26 at 1:59PM MDT until May 26 at 2:45PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Huerfano County in southeastern Colorado... North central Las Animas County in southeastern Colorado... South central Pueblo County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 245 PM MDT. * At 159 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles northeast of Aguilar, or 26 miles north of Trinidad, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Huerfano, north central Las Animas and south central Pueblo Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
